meanings.definition: A room equipped with washing facilities, typically a sink and toilet.
meanings.sent1: The washroom in our house has a sink and a toilet.
meanings.sent2: I need to use the washroom before we leave.
meanings.sent3: The cat thought the washroom sink was a great place to take a nap.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed through the washroom, making it feel like a party.
meanings.sent5: The bright blue walls of the washroom made it feel welcoming and clean.

meanings.definition: A room or building equipped with washing facilities for public use.
meanings.sent1: The park's washroom was clean and well-maintained.
meanings.sent2: I always make sure to visit the washroom before a long road trip.
meanings.sent3: The line for the washroom at the concert was longer than the line for food!
meanings.sent4: The washroom at the train station was a beacon of cleanliness in a chaotic world.
meanings.sent5: The washroom at the beach had a lovely view of the ocean.
